newsitem.title: HONG KONG: Kukdong Engineering sets $30 mln FRN.
newsitem.headline: Kukdong Engineering sets $30 mln FRN.

text.p: The following issue was announced by bookrunner Dongsuk Securities on Wednesday.
BORROWER KUKDONG ENGINEERING & CONSTRUCTION CO LTD
AMOUNT US$30 MLN COUPON 6ML+100 MATURITY 5 YRS
TYPE FRN ISS PRICE PAR LAUNCH 29.JAN.97
PUTS YR 3 CALLS NONE REPLIES 12.FEB.97
LISTING NONE REPAYMENT BULLET DENOMS $500K
RATING -- SALE LMTS US, UK, HONGKONG & OTHERS
NEG PLG ** CRS DEF YES FORCE MAJ IPMA2
HOME CTRY S.KOREA GOV LAW ENGLISH PAY DATE 27.FEB.97
PAY FREQ SEMI-ANNUAL TAX PROV FREE & CLEAR
MGT LEVELS AND FEES
CO-LEAD MANAGERS US$4-5 MLN 141BP ALL-IN 147
SENIOR MANAGERS US$2-3 MLN 135BP ALL-IN 145
LEAD MANAGERS DONGSUH SECURITIES (BOOKS) AND KOREA LONG-TERM
CREDIT BANK (AGENT)
NOTES DIRECT, UNSECURED, UNSUBORDINATED, UNCONDITIONAL AND
RANKED PARI PASSU.
CLEARING THROUGH EUROCLEAR/CEDEL
**NEGATIVE PLEDGE IN CONNECTION WITH THE ISSUE OF
INTERNATIONAL INVESTMENT SECURITIES.
-- Hong Kong Newsroom (852) 2843 6960
